newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CNB-120 INDEX RISES 2.4 POINTS TO 786.5 PTS.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CNB-120 INDEX RISES 2.4 POINTS TO 786.5 PTS.

text.p: The CNB-120 index, a broad daily measure of Czech equities, rose 2.4 points, or 0.31 percent, on Thursday to 786.5, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
Five of the ten sectoral indices gained, with the machinery index rising the most, up 11.2 points, or 1.06 percent, to 1,072.6 points.
Five indices lost, with the trade index losing the most, down 1.7 points, or 0.70 percent, to 239.9 points.
